    Methods in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.compress with parameters of type Compression.HFileDecompressionContext
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    ByteBuffDecompressor.reinit(Compression.HFileDecompressionContext newHFileDecompressionContext)
    Call before every use of ByteBuffDecompressor.canDecompress(ByteBuff, ByteBuff) and ByteBuffDecompressor.decompress(ByteBuff, ByteBuff, int) to reinitialize the decompressor with settings from the HFileInfo.
